query: Java is considered a strictly-typed language.
JavaScript is considered a strictly-typed language.
What is the biggest difference between the first version of Angular and all others since?
choices: The first version of Angular was based on JavaScript instead of TypeScript.
The original Angular required programmers to hop on one foot while coding.
Even one compiling error in the original version would blow up your computer.
answer: The first version of Angular was based on JavaScript instead of TypeScript.
